main()
{
   AAA = 1;
   -BBB-CCC = 0;

	AAA = 0. .0 0.00 . -.;
	BBB = 0x0 0x00 0x;
	BBB = -AAA;

	_VERY_VERY_LONG_IDENTIFIER123456789_IS_OK = -1;

	if (AAA && BBB || EEE) {
		AAA = 0;
		EEE = 0x00fffe;
	}

	YYY = -3.1415926e-8;
	BBB =  -7094;
	AAA =  0644;
	ID = 3.141592653589793238462643383279502884197169399375105820974944592307816406286208998628034825342117067982148086513282306647093844609550582231725359408128481117450284102701938521105559644622948954930381964428810975665933446128475648233E-1025;

	while (DDD <=EEE) {
		YYY =  .3;
	}
	157Lident1

	eurosign -> €
	snowman1 -> ☃
	snowman2 -> ☃$
}
